## CardOrientation enum

Describes whether a card is face up or down.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum CardOrientation 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  FaceDown | <code>1</code> | The back of the card is visible, and the front face is hidden. |
|  FaceUp | <code>0</code> | The front face of the card is visible. |
